name: Slung Together
description:
You are controlling two spiders which are connected with a web. Your goal is to get them to their nest and protect both of them at the same time.

Developers: 

George Karev - Game Design & Level Design (Geo#2684) 

Alec Nepute - Coding & Design (https://anepute.wixsite.com/alecnepute)

Ivan Frolov - Coding 

Mariya Tarasova - Art (Bobby16#8696) 

Valeriy Tarasov - Animation 

Aljoscha Guenther - composer (https://aljoschaguenther.wordpress.com/)
